description: The spicy,&nbsp;rye whiskey-based drink is a great way to start your night. It has the sweet flavor of orange curaçao and&nbsp;club soda for those who aren't feeling too tipsy as well! The absinthe gives this classic cocktail an extra kick that you'll love in every sip.
name: Morning Glory

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the rye whiskey, cognac, curaçao liqueur, simple syrup, absinthe, and bitters in an ice-filled mixing glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the rye whiskey, cognac, curaçao liqueur, simple syrup, absinthe, and bitters in an ice-filled mixing glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into an ice-filled chilled old-fashioned glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into an ice-filled chilled old-fashioned glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Top with club soda to taste. Use 1 to 2 ounces based on your preference.
recipeInstructions.text: Top with club soda to taste. Use 1 to 2 ounces based on your preference.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a lemon twist. Serve and enjoy.
